title: Beers on Trails
description:
Connecting beer drinkers and trail goers, Beers on Trails is a mobile-first web app that unites beer and outdoor enthusiasts through modern location-based technology. 10 Barrel Brewing set out to bridge the gap between tech and active lifestyles—creating a platform that connects beer lovers across the country while they’re out exploring.

We were tasked with designing an MVP to help 10 Barrel attract potential partners and promote the concept. I led product design, creating an experience that features interactive trail maps, brewery discovery, and social sharing of outdoor beer adventures.
shortDescription: Connecting beer drinkers and trail goers.

items.caption: Pulling from 10 Barrel Brewing's brand guidelines, I created a visual language that reflects the brand's personality and values. I created a custom logo and iconset referenceing the brand's color palette, while blending them with 3D elements and interactions.
